sentences.sContent: They were accused of peddling drugs .
people who peddle cigarettes to young children

remMethod.val: ped(脚) + dle → 行走在大街上叫卖 → 兜售

words.tran: 叫卖的；无关紧要的；琐碎的

trans.tranOther: to sell goods to people, especially goods that people disapprove of because they are illegal, harmful, or of not very high quality
